title: Placement elo? is it getting harder?
body:
Hey guys, Just went through my placements won 7 games lost 3 get placed into b4.
Few friends i know won 4 lost 6  or won 3 lost 7 or just terrible win ratio and still get placed in high bronze, b2 or b1 or even silver 5 - 3 and they were the same elo as me? We played at the same time roughly but were solo que.
Just wondering if anyone is getting good win ratio like i did and still getting placed it low bronze elo.

replies.body: Your MMR has been around low bronze for over a month, the placement just put you in a rank that reflects that. As for your friends I'd say their MMR was higher than their rank.

It depends on your first two games for some %%%%ed reason. if you loose the first 2 but still go 5/5 you get your ass kicked for some stupid reason and will end up bronze 3-1. If u win first two and still go 5/5 you will end up silver. GG Riot
weird as i won the first 2 lost 3rd so i was 2 / 1
You obviously weren't at the same MMR.
I threw my placements and tanked your entire server. Deal with it.
